UserEmailCalendarSync.name: UserEmailCalendarSync
UserEmailCalendarSync.description: Represents the user assignments of an Einstein Activity Capture configuration.

AssignedId.description: ID of the user or profile. Only Einstein Activity users can be added to a configuration.

ConfigurationId.description: ID of the Einstein Activity Capture configuration. The configuration is created in Salesforce Setup. After the configuration is created, the autogenerated ID is visible on the Configurations tab. From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Einstein Activity Capture, and then select Settings. Click the Configurations tab.
